name: Ottawa and River Walk-In Clinic
comment:
Walk-in medical clinic * doctors and nurses assess and treat minor illnesses and injuries

Services include:
  • weight loss management
  • childhood and adult vaccinations
  • sexually transmitted infections testing and treatment
  • minor procedures
